conversation.text: Hello again! I'm Alpha. Let me and my friends show you around the Tools archive.
You can use the search bar at the top to instantly filter all the tools by name or by their tags!
See a '.reg' file? That's a registry script. Just double-click it after downloading to apply the tweak.
Logically, files ending in '.cmd' or '.exe' are executable programs or scripts that you can run directly.
And if you see a '.torrent' file, you'll need a special program like uTorrent or FDM to download it. So fun!
This archive holds many secrets... and tools. All for helping Glickko get back up to speed quickly.
Just click on any tool in the list. It will open in a new tab for you. No fuss.
Don't break anything. Or do. What do I care?
